Detailed Description

ReifyNotifySignal

This class allows to reify the invocations to InterfaceSignal::signal.

InterfaceSignal::notify

ReifyNotifySignal* Util::ReifyNotifySignal::reify ( ReifyNotifySignal *  metaobject  ) 

Reify the instance and return the previous metaobject If the instance is already reified then the previous metaobject is reified by the metaobject parameter. Thus, invocation of the signal method on the current instance will go through all meta objects from instance up to the last reified meta object.

Parameters:
mo the meta object for the current instance
Return values:
the previous metat object or 0 if it is the first reification
void Util::ReifyNotifySignal::terminate (  ) 

Reimplemented in Util::EventBufferManager, NS::Server, Ctrl::KillServiceClient, Stat::StatisticsService, FT::CheckpointServer, and FT::FailureDetectorCoordinator.

ReifyNotifySignal* Util::ReifyNotifySignal::unreify (  ) 

unreify the instance that this meta object reified and return the previous baseobject
